original_text: Then I saw another mighty angel coming down from heaven. He was robed in a cloud, with a rainbow above his head; his face was like the sun, and his legs were like fiery pillars.
korean_text: 내가 또 보니 힘 센 다른 천사가 구름을 입고 하늘에서 내려오는데 그 머리 위에 무지개가 있고 그 얼굴은 해 같고 그 발은 불기둥 같으며

sentences.original_text: Then I saw another mighty angel
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 다른 힘 있는 천사를 보았고

sentences.original_text: He was robed in a cloud
with a rainbow above his head
his face was like the sun
and his legs were like fiery pillars
